a01.headline: The generosity of Andy Montana
a01.lead: On February 18th our beloved reporter Jhonatan Ross was beaten by Andy Montana's security.

a02.headline: Is the Prohibition a joke?
a02.lead: Many miscalled "restaurants" offer private parties at night where toxic alcohol is served to the people. Many of these restaurants are property of Andy Montana.

a03.headline: Free food for everyone!
a03.lead: The philanthropist Andy Montana offers charity banquets in the poorest areas of the city."We only want to help the people" said Montana.

a04.headline: The crime takes the city
